project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the project are to: (i) increase fish production in the 100-250 m depths of South China Sea, thus relieving pressure on near-coastal resources; (ii) develop coastal mud flats and low-lying land for aquaculture; (iii) increase production of fruits on sloping land; (iv) bring new land into agricultural production and improve river flow conditions in the Pearl River delta; and  provide modern agroindustrial facilities for handling and processing. To achieve these objectivess the project proposes: (1) provision of 86 fishing vessels; (2) construction of about 4,000 ha of ponds and 11,000 cages for aquaculture; (3) improvement of 10,700 ha and establishment of 3,300 ha of orchards on uncultivated hilly lands; (4) land reclamation works for improvement and expansion of 6,500 ha of surgarcane; (5) establishment of agroprocessing facilities to utilize locally available raw materials; and  (6) a poverty alleviation package comprising studies, infrastructure and development loans for households and village groups in a recognized poverty area.

P003555.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>广东农业开发项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：（1）增加南海100-250米深海域的渔业产量，减轻对近海资源的压力；（2）开发潮间带和低洼地，发展水产养殖；（3）增加水果生产，提高坡地产量；（4）新增农业生产用地，改善珠江三角洲地区江河水流条件；（5）建设现代化工农业产品装卸设施。为实现上述目标，本项目拟：（1）提供86艘渔船；（2）建设4000公顷左右鱼塘和1.1万只网箱；（3）在未开垦的丘陵地带改造1.07万公顷土地，建立3300公顷果园；（4）实施土地开垦工程，改造并扩建6500公顷甘蔗地；（5）建设农产品加工设施，利用当地原材料；（6）实施一揽子扶贫方案，包括在某一贫困地区开展研究、为该地区农户和村组提供基础设施贷款和发展贷款。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
